definitions.definition: The power to enforce rules or give orders.
definitions.example: I have the authority to penalise the staff in my department, but not the authority to sack them.

definitions.definition: (used in singular or plural form) Persons in command; specifically, government.
A person accepted as a source of reliable information on a subject.
definitions.example: the world's foremost authority on orangutans

definitions.definition: Government-owned agency which runs a revenue-generating activity.
